Items.Title: Meeting update
Items.Subtitle: Mon 9/22/2014 7:02AM
Items.Content:
We have to move the location for our next Project Falcon meeting.  Please stay tuned for an update once we've booked a new space.

Thanks,

-Junmin

Items.Title: Person in charge of Project Falcon?
Items.Subtitle: Mon 9/22/2014 12:05AM
